code-table.name: grouping-code
code-table.description: This code table stores grouping designations for FRUS volumes

item.label: Regular
item.definition: Volumes produced according to prevailing norms for timeliness and comprehensiveness

item.label: Accelerated
item.definition: Volumes produced on an accelerated basis to facilitate early release of targeted topics

item.label: Retrospective
item.definition: Volumes produced to address lacunae in existing FRUS coverage
